DOC.brief_title: Quality Control CE-Certified Phonak Hearing Aids - 2015_03
DOC.criteria: Adult hearing impaired person ( minimum age : 18 year ) without ( experience ) hearing aid Good write speak ( Swiss ) German language skills Healthy outer ear Ability fill questionnaire ( p/eCRF ) conscientiously Informed Consent document signature Contraindications MD study , e.g . know hypersensitivity allergy investigational product Limited mobility position attend weekly appointment Limited ability describe listen impressions/experiences use hear aid Inability produce reliable hear test result Massively limited dexterity Known psychological problem Central hear disorder
